member.name: IMFMediaEngineExtension.CancelObjectCreation
member.summary: Cancels the current request to create an object.
member.param: The pointer that was returned in the the ppIUnknownCancelCookie parameter of the method.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineExtension.CanPlayType
member.summary: Queries whether the object can load a specified type of media resource.
member.param: If TRUE, the Media Engine is set to audio-only mode. Otherwise, the Media Engine is set to audio-video mode.
A string that contains a MIME type with an optional codecs parameter, as defined in RFC 4281.
Receives a member of the enumeration.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineExtension.EndCreateObject
member.summary: Completes an asynchronous request to create a byte stream or media source.
member.param: Receives a pointer to the interface of the byte stream or media source. The caller must release the interface
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineExtension
member.summary: Enables an application to load media resources in the Media Engine.
